org.apache.flink.runtime.instance

Class Slot

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.instance.Slot
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SharedSlot, SimpleSlot

    public abstract class Slot
extends Object
    Base class for slots.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static int ALLOCATED_AND_ALIVE 
      protected static int CANCELLED 
      protected Instance instance
      The instance on which the slot is allocated

      The ID of the job this slice belongs to.
      protected static int RELEASED 
      protected int slotNumber
      The number of the slot on which the task is deployed
      protected int status
      The state of the vertex, only atomically updated
      protected static AtomicIntegerFieldUpdater<Slot> STATUS_UPDATER

        public boolean markDead()
        Marks this shared slot to be dead. Returns if the slot was alive before. Should only be called through the SlotSharingGroupAssignment attribute assignmentGroup.
        Returns:
        if the slot was alive before
